testsuite.name: com.dmitrii.socialnetwork.service.UserServiceSpec

testcase.name: Registration with unique username should succeed
Registration with existing username should throw exception
Find by non-existing ID should throw exception
Get user by username should return correct data
Exception when searching contains correct message
